meanings: stupid, foolish, idiotic, (informal) dumb, (informal) thickheaded, (impolite) half-witted

vlive.korean: 야 이 멍청아! Hey, you idiot! 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.18 논리나잇 Ⅱ #1 (Debate Night Ⅱ #1)
멍청아 멍청이라고 했지? - 뭔 소리 꿀... Did you call me idiot? - What? Oink... 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 에이티즈와 함께 하는 고요속의 외침🎧
vlive.english: Did you call me idiot? - What? Oink...

vlive.korean: 멍청아 - 사과 즙을 조금 더 넣을까? Fool. - Should I add more apple juice? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 웅이와 만들어웅 #2
vlive.english: Fool. - Should I add more apple juice?

vlive.korean: 묽다며 물을 왜 넣어 멍청아~ - 아! Fool, you said it was watery but why are you adding water? - Oh! 듣기 View video AB6IX : 웅이와 만들어웅 #2
vlive.english: Fool, you said it was watery but why are you adding water? - Oh!

vlive.korean: 멍청아 네가 신발끈을 제대로 묶은 적이 한 번이라도 있야? Have you ever been able to tie shoe laces right? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 학교에 우리에 대한 소문이 돈다 [연애미수] EP02 좋아하는 사람이 있으니까.
vlive.english: Have you ever been able to tie shoe laces right?

examples.korean: Don’t just stand there, you dummy. 발음듣기 그냥 거기 서 있지만 마, 이 멍청아. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Don’t just stand there, you dummy. 발음

examples.korean: Jog on your way! You idiot! 발음듣기 네 길로 꺼져! 멍청아! 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Jog on your way! You idiot! 발음

examples.korean: It’s about fraygon time, you idiot! 발음듣기 지금이 빌어먹을 때야, 이 멍청아! 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: It’s about fraygon time, you idiot! 발음

examples.korean: Do you know what you've done, you empty-headed fool? 발음듣기 네가 무슨 짓을 한 건 줄 아니, 이 골 빈 멍청아? 생활 표현 사전
examples.english: Do you know what you've done, you empty-headed fool? 발음

examples.korean: Use your noggin, you stupid! 발음듣기 머리 좀 써라, 멍청아! Neungyule
examples.english: Use your noggin, you stupid! 발음
